para.text: (TestValue, Value1, Value2, ...) returns the index of whichever of the Value1, Value2, ... values is closest to TestValue. For example, Closest(2.7, 1, 3, 5) would return 2 because 2.7 is closer to 3 than to any of the other values and 3 is the second value in the list of values to which TestValue will be compared.
